review: So i purchased both a Fire TV and a Roku 3 streaming media player. The Roku 3 was good but nothing compared to the Amazon Fire TV. The biggest thing is the Speed. Roku 3 was just to slow for our internet connection. It did have added channels and features that the Fire TV didn't but in my opinion this is all about the speed. The speed of the Fire TV is unmatched! For us the Fire TV will start and load in 10 to 15 seconds the Roku was 45 to 50 seconds to load. Have heard people love the Roku 3 and I could see that if you have a really good internet connection. For us the speed and functionality of the Fire TV were hands down better. Thanks Amazon another great product.
author: MT Admin
